Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It's not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its intrinsic value and the effort put into creating it, I kindly propose a price of $15000 for this product. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and exceptional customer support to ensure your satisfaction. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if there's any way I can make this offer more appealing to you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
